programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar naruto com a vov chiyo, que est sofrendo com o veneno. Os membros da equipe guy correm paraajudar a equipe kakashi. Enquanto isso, com as preparaes completas, kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esttica De Um Momento
programme.desc: Na Aldeia da Folha, a equipe de Konohamaru foi promovida a Genin e agora est sob a superviso de Ebisu. Um Naruto mais velho chega aldeia aps uma longa jornada de treinamento com Jiraiya. Naruto Uzumaki est de volta!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Legado
programme.desc: Jiraiya traz notcias altamente secretas de que os Akatsuki entraram em ao. Naruto e Sakura propem a Kakashi um desafio de sobrevivncia. Na Aldeia da Areia, Gaara o Kazekage agora, e membros da Akatsuki se infiltram na aldeia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Volta Do Kazekage
programme.desc: As habilidades de Naruto e Sakura foram Kakashi a usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto lana um jutsu aps outro. Sakura usa tcnicas ensinadas a ela por Tsunade. Deidara da Akatsuki comea uma operao secreta para se infiltrar na Aldeia da Areia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo
programme.desc: Gaara percebe a presena de Deidara e comea uma batalha area na areia. O jonin da areia Yura, um agente da Akatsuki, e a Aldeia da Areia sofre danos. Na Aldeia da Folha, Naruto e Sakura veem o incrvel poder de Kakashi. A dupla d seu golpe final.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Formao! A Nova Equipe Kakashi
programme.desc: Naruto e Sakura derrotam Kakashi. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de trs liderados por Kakashi, dizendo que agora so todos iguais. Gaara e Deidara continuam sua batalha. Baki fica preocupado que o shukaku se materialize, mas Kankuro ri da ideia.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Aps o ataque do Cl Otsutsuki, o Encontro dos Cinco Kages acontece na Aldeia da Folha. Os Kages atuais e seus predecessores se renem, exceto por Ohnoki, o Terceiro Tsuchikage.
programme.sub-title: A pedra mais dura do mundo

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Os ninjas encarregados de guardar o Porto da Aldeia da Folha so atacados, e Mitsuki desaparece.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A aldeia descobre que Boruto e Sarada saram em busca de Mitsuki. Ento a Equipe 10, de Shikadai, recebe a misso de rastre-los e traz-los de volta.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Orochimaru fala para Boruto e Sakura sobre o Sbio da Cobra Branca que vive na Caverna Ryuchi. No caminho, os dois so confrontados pela Equipe 10.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e seus amigos descobrem que, para se encontrar com o Sbio da Cobra Branca, precisaro passar por uma srie de testes.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O Sbio da Cobra Branca pede que Boruto traga para ele uma "Escama Invertida" de Garaga, uma cobra problemtica.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e companhia trabalham juntos para conseguir a Escama Invertida de Garaga, mas a batalha se mostra difcil, uma vez que Garaga tem o poder de sentir a localizao dos inimigos e transform-los em pedra.
programme.sub-title: Um inimigo feroz: O ataque cruel de Garaga!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mitsuki vai para a terra natal de Kokuyou e Sekiei, o Pas da Terra.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e seus amigos conseguem superar Kokuyou e finalmente alcanam Mitsuki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Em vez de voltar para casa com Boruto, Mitsuki fica com Kokuyou.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto est ferido, inconsciente e no pode mais continuar. Todos pensam em voltar para a Aldeia da Folha.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Determinados a encontrar Ohnoki, a equipe se infiltra na aldeia sem saber que est sendo observada.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A equipe encontra Ohnoki, mas ele se recusa a ajudar. Para piorar a situao, eles so atacados e acabam se separando.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.desc: Camp Crystal Lake has been shuttered for over 20 years due to several vicious and unsolved murders. The camp's new owner and seven young counselors are readying the property for re-opening despite warnings of a "death curse" by local residents.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part II, (1981, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Five years after the bloodbath at Camp Crystal, all that remains is the legend of Jason and his demented mother, who had murdered seven camp counsellors. At a nearby summer camp, the new counsellors are unconcerned about the warnings to stay away.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III, (1982, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Ignoring Camp Crystal Lakes bloody legacy, one by one they fall victim to the maniacal Jason who stalks them at every turn...

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part - IV: The Final Chapter, (1984, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: After his revival in a hospital morgue, the hockey-masked murderer fixes his vengeful attention on the Jarvis family and a group of hitherto carefree teenagers.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, (1980, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Camp Crystal Lake has been shuttered for over 20 years due to several vicious and unsolved murders. The camp's new owner and seven young counselors are readying the property for re-opening despite warnings of a "death curse" by local residents.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part II, (1981, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Five years after the bloodbath at Camp Crystal, all that remains is the legend of Jason and his demented mother, who had murdered seven camp counsellors. At a nearby summer camp, the new counsellors are unconcerned about the warnings to stay away.

programme.title: Death Note: Confession
programme.desc: Light goes to Aoyama to discover the identity of the second Kira before L becomes more suspicious.

programme.title: Death Note: Friend
programme.desc: Light and Misa show each other their Death Notes, and Light asks Misa to have her shinigami Rem get rid of L.

programme.title: Death Note: Wager
programme.desc: Evidence turns up that points to Misa Amane as the second Kira.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yukako Yamagishi Dreams of Cinderella
programme.desc: Yukako, depressed because she cant get Koichi to return her feelings, comes across a beauty salon where the owner claims a special beauty treatment will help customers find love and happiness

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yoshikage Kira Just Wants to Live Quietly, Part 1
programme.desc: A man named Yoshikage Kira is enjoying his lunch break at the park with a sandwich in hand. But his peaceful afternoon is cut short when Shigechi accidentally takes Kiras sandwich bag, believing it to be his own.
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira Just Wants to Live Quietly, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yoshikage Kira Just Wants to Live Quietly, Part 2
programme.desc: Yoshikage Kira is revealed to be the serial killer whos been lurking in Morioh, and a Stand user as well. Having discovered his secret, Shigechi tries to fight off Kira with his Harvest, only to suffer fatal wounds from the killers Stand, Deadly Queen
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira Just Wants to Live Quietly, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Heart Attack, Part 1
programme.desc: Jotaro and Koichi come under the attack of Yoshikage Kiras Stand bomb, called Heart Attack. Narrowly escaping the blast, Koichi tries to go after the serial killer but is stopped by Jotaro, who tells him to focus on dealing with the Stand bomb first.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Heart Attack, Part 2
programme.desc: Kira is forced to appear before Koichi after his remote Heart Attack bomb is made useless by the boys new Stand, Reverb Act 3. Finally coming face-to-face with the serial killer, Koichi attacks him with Act 3.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Heart Father
programme.desc: Josuke and his friends are at Yoshikage Kiras home trying to find any clues that may lead them to the serial killer, who has gone into hiding under a new face and identity.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Janken Boy Is Coming!
programme.desc: Kiras father, Yoshihiro, begins searching for Stand users who would help protect his son from his pursuers. Meanwhile, Rohan is taking photos at the train station when he is suddenly challenged to a game of rock-paper-scissors.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: I'm an Alien
programme.desc: While on their way to school, Josuke and Okuyasu find a young man lying unconscious in the middle of what appears to be a crop circle. When they try to take a closer look, the man suddenly wakes up and starts claiming hes an alien from outer space.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: After losing to Knuckle and Shoot, Gon and Killua return home to Palm.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: While Gon is on his date with Palm, Killua encounters Rammot in the forest. Just when their battle is about to begin, Killua hears his brother's voice in his head, telling him to run away.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knuckle and Morel appear to be overwhelmed by the speed of Cheetu's attacks, but they have a chance at victory.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Kalluto, Feitan, Shalnark, Phinks, Shizuku, and Bonolenov meet in Meteor City, the home of the Phantom Troupe. They have returned after getting the news that the Chimera Ant, Zazan, has built her nest in their city.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The members of the Phantom Troupe go to Zazan's nest to defeat her. The Troupe splits up to confront Zazan's minions individually. As they battle, each member of the Troupe reveals their secret ability.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Killua arrive in a village in East Gorteau but find no trace of the inhabitants.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: A pair of Chimera Ants appears and hunts Gon under the cover of night, overwhelming him with their attacks. Feeling that things are at a standstill, he gathers up his Nen and prepares to throw a punch.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knuckle and Shoot are lying in wait for Cheetu. But just as Cheetu is about to approach them, he suddenly changes direction and disappears. Meanwhile, Killua and Gon sense that someone is following them again.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The assassin Ikalgo, an octopus-type Chimera Ant, attacks Killua with his Nen Abilities. Killua captures him and tells Ikalgo that he'll let him live if he divulges his ally's abilities.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon tries to bond with a Chimera Ant called Meleoron, even though it's risky for a Nen user to reveal his abilities.

programme.title: Death Note: Wager
programme.desc: Evidence turns up that points to Misa Amane as the second Kira.

programme.title: Death Note: Decision
programme.desc: Misa is in confinement, though her memories of the Death Note have been completely wiped away.

programme.title: Death Note: Execution
programme.desc: After fifty days of confinement the killings continue, and Misa and Light are released.

programme.title: Death Note: Ally
programme.desc: Though L is still suspicious, Light and Misa, their memories of being Kira wiped clean, return to headquarters.

programme.title: Death Note: Matsuda
programme.desc: Matsuda, the task force member assigned to watch Misa, is eager to distinguish himself.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Highway Go Go, Part 1
programme.desc: Rohan is convinced that Josuke is cheating in their game of Cee-lo when all the dice rolls in his opponents favor. Feeling insulted, Rohan stabs his own finger and swear hell find out how Josuke is cheating in their next round.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Highway Go Go, Part 2
programme.desc: Rohan sacrifices himself to save Josuke from a remote-controlled Stand that sucks nutrients out of its victims. Moved by Rohans act of bravery, Josuke races through town to find and defeat the Stands user before it can kill Rohan.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Cats Love Yoshikage Kira
programme.desc: Shinobu tells her husband, Kosaku, that she saw a stray cat in their basement with a hole in its throat. When Kosaku goes down to take a look, he finds the cat already dead, The next morning, a strange plant sprouts from the spot where the cat was buried.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 1
programme.desc: Yoshihiro Kira spots Kosaku Kawajiri and instantly recognizes that its actually his son, Yoshikage. Meanwhile, Josuke, Okuyasu, and Mikitaka find a strange man living in an abandoned electrical tower.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 2
programme.desc: Josuke enters the electrical tower again to save Mikitaka and defeat Toyohiro Kanedaichi. Meanwhile, Rohan receives a visit from a first-class architect named Masazo Kinoto, whos come to estimate the repair costs to his burnt house.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 3
programme.desc: Rohan finds himself possessed by Masazo Kinotos Stand, Cheap Trap, who tells the manga artist to burn the photos he took of the people in Morioh. Meanwhile, Josuke and Yuya encounter the Stand user responsible for Koichis disappearance.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 4
programme.desc: Rohan calls over Koichi to help him fight off Cheap Trap, which has attached itself onto Rohans back. Unfortunately, Koichi thinks Rohan is pulling a prank on him and leaves.

programme.title: Seeing everyone turning into Ice Oni, there is nothing that the samurai warriors can do other than grieve. However, it wasn't just them who were devastated by Queen's raging virus. When their desperation and frustration peak, they hear a hopeful voice.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The wounded Akazaya members are surprised to see Kozuki Oden alive. They were disappointed by their failure to take down Kaido, but now with their lord, they are filled with hope to face their sworn enemy again.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Oden Appears! The Confused Hearts of the Akazaya Members!

programme.title: The Akazaya members run to save Momonosuke, but an unexpected contender stands in their way. Queen gets infuriated after Chopper ruined his plot and goes after him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst Generation Gets Wiped Out?! The Emperors Deadly Attack!

programme.title: The returned Orochi clashes the Akazaya members who are trying to save Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Luffy and the others are all covered in bruises, but they unite their strength and launch an attack.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Supernovas Strike Back! The Mission to Tear Apart the Emperors!

programme.title: Even after Big Mom was pushed off of the island, Zoro and the others keep fighting the exhausting battle against Kaido. When Kaido tries to beat up the unconscious Luffy, Zoro launches an all-out attack at the risk of his life.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Defend Luffy! Zoro and Laws Sword Technique!

programme.title: Luffy remembers how he was advised by his friends, how he was saved by his comrades, and the frustrations of being defeated. As Kaido mocks him to his face, the Color of the Supreme King Haki gushes out and they clash again.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Surpass the Emperor of the Sea! Luffy Strikes Back with an Iron Fist!

programme.title: Countless souls have been lured along the Grand Line in pursuit of the legendary One Piece! Luffy D. Monkey is a young pirate with a dream: to prove the legend true and be king of them all!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I'm Luffy! The Man Who's Gonna Be King of the Pirates!

programme.title: Luffy and his new companion Coby set sail in search of the infamous pirate hunter Zoro, rumored to be held captive at the Marine Base.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter the Great Swordsman! Pirate Hunter Roronoa Zoro!

programme.title: Luffy is in the line of fire after saving Zoro, and now tyrannical Captain Morgan is out for their heads! Zoro must decide if he will join forces with Luffy or die in captivity.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Morgan versus Luffy! Who's the Mysterious Pretty Girl?

programme.title: Luffy recalls a time when Captain Red-Haired Shanks taught him a valuable lesson in friendship and set him on his quest to be King of the Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy crosses paths with the clever thief Nami. A navigator on a quest to collect one hundred million berries, shes perfect for Luffys new crew except for the fact that Nami hates pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Terrifying Mysterious Power! Captain Buggy, the Clown Pirate!

programme.title: Having delivered a deadly blow to Captain Buggys pirates, Luffy and his companions need a place to recuperate. But the three are not in hiding very long before the Beast Tamer Mohji seeks them out.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Desperate Situation! Beast Tamer Mohji vs. Luffy!

programme.title: In the ongoing fight with Captain Buggys pirates, Zoro must face off with the Acrobat Cabaji while Luffy continues to do battle with the Pirate Clown himself.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Epic Showdown! Swordsman Zoro vs. Acrobat Cabaji!

programme.title: Luffy and the gang are on the run after the battle with Captain Buggy! With no place to go and nothing else to do, Nami finally agrees to join Luffy on his quest.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Who is the Victor? Devil Fruit Power Showdown!

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, and Nami arrive at an island hoping to obtain a ship and crew, but the three are quickly confronted with the blustering Captain Usopp who has a connection to Luffys past.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy follows Usopp to the mansion and encounters the brutal pirate Captain Kuro. The scoundrel plans to claim Kayas fortune and live the stolen life of luxury.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Weirdest Guy Ever! Jango the Hypnotist!

programme.title: Usopp spreads the word of Kuros evil plot and the impending pirate attack, but no one believes his warnings. The Straw Hat Pirates decide to help Usopp put a stop to the dastardly scheme.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Expose the Plot! Pirate Butler, Captain Kuro!

programme.title: Luffy and crew seek to best Captain Kuro, but theyve prepared their defense on the wrong side of the island! All looks grim now that Usopp must face off against the Black Cat Pirates alone.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Clash with the Black Cat Pirates! The Great Battle on the Slope!

programme.title: In an effort to save Usopps village, the Straw Hat Pirates seek to block the marauders path from the sea. With Luffy out of the battle, Zoro must face the fearsome Meowban Brothers!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Terrifying Duo! Meowban Brothers vs. Zoro!

programme.title: Nami manages to rescue Zoros missing swords and attempts to revive Luffy. With one of the Meowban brothers down, the other rages on even more fiercely than before!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Back in Action! Miss Kaya's Desperate Resistance!

programme.title: Usopps friends run away with the heiress Kaya. Jango races off after them, but not before sending Butchie into a berserk rage. As Zoro continues his battle, Luffy takes on Captain Kuro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Beat Kuro! Usopp the Man's Tearful Resolve!

programme.title: Luffy battles with Kuro on the beach, while the Veggies (with Kaya in tow) flee Jango the Hypnotist.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect Kaya! The Usopp Pirates' Great Efforts!

programme.title: Kaya rewards the Straw Hat Pirates efforts to save her with a ship to call their own the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Anger Explosion! Kuro vs. Luffy! How it Ends!

programme.title: On the legendary Treasure Island, Luffy and crew encounter strange animals and an even stranger man named Gaimon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: You're the Weird Creature! Gaimon and His Strange Friends!

programme.title: In the past, young Zoro sparred constantly with a girl named Kuina, but he could never claim victory. They vowed that one of them would someday be the worlds greatest swordsman but tragedy intervened.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Three-Sword Style's Past! Zoro and Kuina's Vow!

programme.title: The Straw Hats need a cook among their crew, so they head to a nearby restaurant and meet a passionate Sous Chef named Sanji.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Famous Cook! Sanji of the Sea Restaurant!

programme.title: Luffy witnesses the fighting prowess and compassionate nature of the Sous Chef Sanji. The good news: The Going Merrys found a cook! The bad news: He has no intention of joining the crew!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Unwelcome Customer! Sanji's Food and Ghin's Debt!

programme.title: The staff and patrons of the Baratie panic when Don Krieg arrives! The starving pirate begs for nourishment, only to find himself denied. Unable to see a wretch starve, Sanji steps in once again.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Pirate Fleet! Commodore Don Krieg!

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: Looper, (2012, Thriller)
programme.desc: In this futuristic action thriller, time travel will be illegal and only available on the black market. When the mob wants to get rid of someone, they will send their target 30 years into the past where a 'looper,' a hired gun, is waiting to mop up.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A., (1996, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The man with the patch is back. Call him Snake. His job: wade through L.A.s ruined landmarks to retrieve a doomsday device, with a wild assortment of friends, fiends and foes.

programme.title: Criminal, (2016, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: The memories and skills of a deceased CIA agent are implanted into an unpredictable and dangerous convict in order to complete the agent's final assignment.

programme.title: The Kentuckian, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: Eli Wakefield (Burt Lancaster) and his son are Kentucky adventurers longing for life on the Texas frontier. They learn, however, that their greatest challenge lies not in the uncharted wilderness, but in the people they meet along the way.

programme.title: Red River, (1948, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: El Dorado, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum plays to perfection an alcoholic but gutsy sheriff who relentlessly battles the dark side of the wild West, ruthless cattle barons and crooked businessmen.

programme.title: The Way West, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Icons Kirk Douglas, Robert Mitchum and Richard Widmark star in this sumptuous, epic tale of the brave men and women in the U.S. who left the comfort and safety of life in the East for the promise of free land a better life in the untamed West.

programme.title: Riders Of The Whistling Pines, (1949, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry believes he has accidentally shot a man, but learns that the guilt lies with men trying to stop a destructive moth infestation. Will modern chemicals be used to save the day, against Gene?

programme.title: Rim Of The Canyon, (1949, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry, playing a dual role as his father and himself, is stranded by thieves who are searching for a stolen $30,000. A schoolteacher aids Gene with his search for the outlaws and the treasure.

programme.title: The Cowboy and the Lady, (1938, Drama)
programme.desc: A lonely socialite masquerades as a maid and meets an unpretentious, plain-spoken cowboy who is unaware of her true identity.

programme.title: The Longest Yard, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a pro quarterback and former college champion and coach are asked to put together a football team of inmates to take on the guards while doing their time in prison.

programme.title: Norbit, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild-mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.title: The Mexican, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A man tries to transport an ancient gun called The Mexican, believed to carry a curse, back across the border, while his girlfriend pressures him to give up his criminal ways.

programme.title: Reindeer Games, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Just one week before Christmas, after serving six years in jail, an ex-con is forced to take part in a deadly casino heist. Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron, and Gary Sinise star in this action-packed crime thriller from director John Frankenheimer.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.

programme.title: Vantage Point, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: During an historic counter-terrorism summit in Spain, the President of the United States is struck down by an assassin's bullet. Eight strangers have a perfect view of the kill, but what did they really see? Rated: PG-13

programme.title: The Way of the Gun, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A pair of bumbling criminals kidnap a woman for ransom money, but they soon realize they've made a huge mistake when they learn she is a surrogate for a ruthless mob boss.

programme.title: The Mexican, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A man tries to transport an ancient gun called The Mexican, believed to carry a curse, back across the border, while his girlfriend pressures him to give up his criminal ways.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends help set up the stage for the Coming of Age Day ceremony. They befriend four girls who are actually the Amazoness Quartet.
programme.sub-title: Dream to be an Adult: The Amazoness' Confusion

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Strange spider webs begin to appear all across the Juban District. The girls notice that these webs are all originating from the Dead Moon Circus.
programme.sub-title: Terror in Motion: The Dark Queen's Evil Hand

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nehelenia sets her plan in motion by starting a solar eclipse that will leave the world in eternal darkness.
programme.sub-title: The Source of Darkness: Dead Moon Circus

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Dead Moon discovers that Sailor Chibi Moon was hiding Pegasus and captures her. Sailor Chibi Moon learns the history behind the Dead Moon's queen.
programme.sub-title: Labyrinth of Mirrors: Chibi Moon Captured

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nehelenia demands that Helios give up the Golden Crystal in exchange for Sailor Chibi Moon. The Sailor Guardians are struggling to defeat Zirconia.
programme.sub-title: The Golden Crystal Appears: Nehalennia's Magic

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nehelenia regains her full power and proceeds to put the world into an eternal slumber.Sailor Moon tries to activate the power of the Golden Crystal.
programme.sub-title: When the Crystal Shines: The Beautiful Power of Dreams

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Golden Crystals power defeats Nehelenia, pushing her back into the abyss. Nehelenia tries to take Sailor Chibi Moon with her.
programme.sub-title: Dreams Forever: Fill the Heavens with Light

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends start their new lives as high school girls. Nehalennia breaks out of her prison to seek revenge against the Sailor Guardians.
programme.sub-title: The Flower of Nightmares Scatters: The Queen of Darkness Returns

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Hotaru starts to age at an accelerated rate, from a baby to a young girl within days. She warns of coming danger that will soon befall Sailor Moon.
programme.sub-title: Saturn Awakens: The Ten Sailor Guardians Unite

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The city is being plagued by a strange illness that causes people to become obsessed with staring into the mirror for hours, even days.
programme.sub-title: The Cursed Mirror: Mamoru Caught in a Nightmare

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon is left devastated after seeing Mamoru get abducted To make matters worse, Nehalennias action is starting to cause a time paradox.
programme.sub-title: Night of Destiny: The Sailor Guardians' Ordeals

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon runs off to save Mamoru from Nehalennia. The rest of the Sailor Guardians try to go after her, but they fall victim to Nehalennias traps.
programme.sub-title: For Love: The Endless Battle in the Dark World

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Chibi Moon and Sailor Saturn make it to Nehalennias palace, where Mamoru is being held prisoner. The two Guardians are unable to free him.
programme.sub-title: Moon Power of Love: The Nightmare Ends

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru tells Usagi that hes accepted an offer to study abroad in the U.S., which will force them to have a long-distance relationship.
programme.sub-title: Farewells and Encounters: The Transitioning Stars of Destiny

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi runs into Seiya and is annoyed by his cocky attitude. The next day, Seiya and the rest of Three Lights have transferred to her school.
programme.sub-title: A School Storm: The Transfer Students Are Idols

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako decides to work for the Three Lights as their personal assistant. But Minako soon realizes that being a star is not all fun and glamor.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Three Lights are rehearsing for their upcoming musical. But they seem to have a hard time winning the approval of the stage director.
programme.sub-title: Fighter's Secret Identity: The Shocking Super Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami invites Taiki to come and watch the Watarus Comet pass by Earth with their science teacher Amanogawa, only to be rejected.
programme.sub-title: A Star of Dreams and Wishes: Taiki's Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls are searching for Luna, who has gone missing. To their surprise, they find Luna being introduced on TV as Yatens pet cat.
programme.sub-title: Luna's Discovery: The Real Face of Yaten

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Taiki asks Makoto to appear on a cooking show with him. Usagi decides to tag along, but her clumsiness creates a huge mess at the TV studio.
programme.sub-title: Friend or Foe? Star Lights and the Sailor Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls try to buy tickets to a Three Lights concert. Michiru gives them the tickets, revealing that she will be preforming.
programme.sub-title: Calling of the Shining Stars: Enter Haruka and Michiru

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Seiya asks Usagi out on a date, to which she agrees. Sailor Iron Mouse attempts to make up for her recent failures by going after Seiyas star seed.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Luna encounter a girl who appears to be lost. The two are surprised to find the same girl now living in Usagis house as her younger sister.
programme.sub-title: Invaders from Outer Space: The Coming of Siren

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Over the summer, the girls go camping in the mountains, where they run into the Three Lights, who are there shooting for an upcoming film.
programme.sub-title: The Screaming Dead: Terror of the Camp Monster

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi ends up agreeing to let Seiya spend the night at her place. Worried about leaving two teenagers together, the rest of the girls decide to join.
programme.sub-title: A Night Alone Together: Usagi in Danger

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Taiki begins to question if their activity as Three Lights is really helping with their goal of finding their missing princess.
programme.sub-title: Taiki's Song Filled with Passion and Faith

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Chibi has been coming home with lots of snacks. Curious where shes getting the snacks from, Usagi and the girls decide to follow Chibi-Chibi.
programme.sub-title: Chibi-Chibi's Mystery: The Big Noisy Chase

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi teamed up with Seiya for the school softball tournament. Usagi becomes a target of Seiyas jealous fans, who think she is hitting on him.
programme.sub-title: The Shining Power of a Star: Chibi-Chibi's Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Aluminum Siren learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. She sets a trap on a plane in order to get Usagis attention.
programme.sub-title: Invitation to Terror: Usagi's Night Flight

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A rift is created between the Sailor Guardians and the Star Lights after they discover each others secret identities.
programme.sub-title: Duty or Friendship: Conflict Between the Sailor Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Uranus and the other Outer Guardians warn the Star Lights to never see Sailor Moon again. Usagi is worried about Seiya after he gets injured.
programme.sub-title: Truth Revealed: The Star Lights' Past

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami and the others try to clear up the misunderstanding the Three Lights have about Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Butterflies of Light: A New Chapter on the Horizon

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako is close to realizing her lifelong dream of becoming an idol after making it to the final round of auditions in a talent-search contest.
programme.sub-title: Go for Your Dream: Minako Becomes an Idol

programme.desc: The overnight train from Glasgow to London is hacked; passengers are trapped on board, including police officer Joe; as the train hurtles towards disaster, Joe manages to make contact with Abby, the cyber security director.

programme.title: Tootoo
programme.desc: Jordin Tootoos life has been predicated on his determination to rise above every challenge he has faced including the extraordinary pressure of being the first Inuk player in the NHL, addiction and tragic personal loss.

programme.title: Mom vs. Matchmaker
programme.desc: The players are the same, but the game has changed; Anthony is back to find the perfect man.

programme.title: Nightsleeper
programme.desc: The overnight train from Glasgow to London is hacked; passengers are trapped on board, including police officer Joe; as the train hurtles towards disaster, Joe manages to make contact with Abby, the cyber security director.

programme.title: How Not to Hire a Hitman
programme.desc: Bob and Farah are locked in a messy custody battle over their three young children; when one of them ends up dead, the men accused of the murder point the finger at the surviving spouse.

programme.title: Rise of the Footsoldier: Vengeance
programme.desc: Pat Tate sets out on a rampage to avenge his trusted footsoldiers violent death, going into the dark side of Soho to track down the villain responsible. Hell stop at nothing to enact his revenge, even as the world around him starts to explode. Starring Craig Fairbrass, Jamie Foreman, George Russo.

programme.title: The Great British Heist
programme.desc: Three bank robbers take refuge in a local club as the police close in. While the long arm of the law surrounding them outside their sanctuary inside the club is threatened as they start to wonder, are their hostages all that they seem to be? Starring David Brook, Kane Cantell, Richard Harding.

programme.title: Finally Caught
programme.desc: Sydney Loofes vibrant life takes a tragic turn in November 2017 when she enters the world of online dating and unknowingly crosses paths with Bailey Boswell and Aubrey Trail; as their second date approaches, the couple hatches a sinister plan.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A honeymoon cruise goes awry when the bride is allegedly blown off a balcony in the middle of the night; but when the weather report comes in for the evening showing no wind, a murder investigation begins.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A surprise cruise vacation for a husband and wife from Olympia, Washington ends up with one of them going overboard; is it revenge, jealousy or a murderous impulse at sea?

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A professors assistant goes missing at sea near the end of a long voyage; clues to her disappearance are detailed in a diary discovered in her cabin; how did she disappear; does anyone on board know what happened to her?

programme.title: Mom vs. Matchmaker
programme.desc: Picky planner Courtney likes hot yoga and hotter men; her tractor-driving mother wont settle for less than farm fresh perfection.

programme.title: Mom vs. Matchmaker
programme.desc: The Matchmaker has her hands full finding a funny, winning date for Jessica to fall in love with.

programme.title: Gaslit by My Husband: The Morgan Metzer Story
programme.desc: After a masked intruder assaults Morgan Metzer in her home, her ex-husband, Rodney, shows up minutes later. Questioned by the authorities, Rodneys story doesnt seem to add up, making him the prime suspect in the attack. Starring Jana Kramer, Austin Nichols, J. Barrett Cooper.

programme.title: The Hands That Feed Us
programme.desc: Exploring the challenges of making a living as a modern Canadian farmer; how they sell their food and how little control they have over the process and price; from small scale to massive debt; from farmers markets to supply chain.
